basics.name: Pablo Fernandez
basics.label: Softare Engineer
basics.summary:
I enjoy being involved in all phases of a
development project, contributing ideas and
solutions at every stage. I thrive on working on
diverse projects, which allows me to embark on
different challenges and continuously learn

work.name: Kindred Group
work.summary: Maintaining an application for internal customers in the Support and Operations (SOPS) team. Using PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. With a strong focus on asynchronous functions.
responsibilities: Create and integrate new functionalities in the form of extensions into the Customer Support software
Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving coding standards within the team.
Participate in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
Integration with a third-party legacy system

work.name: The Rank Group (YoBrands)
work.summary: Managed a small team, mentored and advised colleagues. Set guidelines and standards. And delivered several projects in collaboration with different departments and teams.
responsibilities: Set Coding Standards: Established and enforced coding guidelines to ensure consistency, readability, and maintainability
Promote Best Practices: Advocated for best practices, including version control, CI/CD and Agile methodologies
Code Reviewing: Conducted code reviews to ensure quality, functionality, and adherence to standards
People Management: Led and mentored the rest of the developers. Conducted performance reviews, and resolved conflicts with the members of my team
achievements: Created and launched the first Bingo Live Streaming in Spain (El Show de YoBingo)
Migration of an existing brand within the company into the system
Launched 3 Android apps by converting the sites into PWAs
Defined the new architecture of the project

work.name: The Rank Group (YoBrands)
work.summary: Joined a tech team of 3 that grew up to 32. Developed several features and architectural changes. Took ownership of the Bingo game product.
responsibilities: Developed modules and functionalities
Developed several functionalities into the main product, the bingo game, like new game modes
Built a new mobile UI for the main brand (YoBingo)
Built the front-end for an in-house Roulette game
Creation of new brands: Developed two new brand websites from a design concept to launch (YoCasino, YoSports)
Mobile Applications: Developed and launched Progressive Web Apps (PWA / TWA) for all the sites of the company
achievements: Mobile redesign for the main site
Creation of 2 new brands following the mockups given by the Design Team
Add and prepare a new market into the project

work.name: Ogilvy
work.summary: Developed multiple pages for different external clients, focusing on delivery times. Working with different teams in an extremely fast paced environment
responsibilities: Developed new features and requests of the clients
Maintained and updated the main websites for different clients
Developed landing pages to collect user data to store it in a database so it could be later sent to Salesforce for marketing analytics

work.name: eDreams ODIGEO
work.summary: Developed marketing campaigns, landing pages and content management. With a mindset on multi-brand and multi-market coordination
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Worked with several departments such as Design, UI, UX, CRM, SEO, SEM, Social Media, Key Account Management
Involved in different types of testings, A/B, on-site, eye tracking
Developed different types of landing pages used for the different monthly campaigns, where each had a unique approach and required the development of new widgets and components
Managed and developed landing pages for airline companies and tourism offices globally
Maintained and updated the content for the main website and four different brand websites, each targeting different markets/countries
Coordinated the management of content and web components across multiple brands, ensuring consistency and localization for each market
Worked for different countries such as: Spain, Italy, France, UK, USA, Australia, Sweden, Germany
achievements: Created a dynamic template capable of loading its content from the URL in order to give a push to the smallest markets through CRM campaigns

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.

highlights: Allows to play preset and custom tracks, change their tempo and automate it

projects.name: YoNunca - Web
projects.description: The online version of one of the most popular drinking games around the world

projects.name: Programming Tutor

highlights: To University and Higher Certificate students

otherProjects.name: Forum Administrator
otherProjects.description: Administrator of one of the largest Spanish-speaking forums

otherProjects.name: LvLoL
otherProjects.description: Auto-bot written in Java to play LoL
highlights: Bot that moved and clicked automatically in the screen using real-time screenshots to avoid detection
